message.content: At each stage, the width of the rectangle is increasing by $1(3'') = 3''$.  Therefore, the width of the rectangle at Stage 6 is $3 + 5(3'') = \boxed{18}''$.  The length of the rectangle remains constant at $3''$, so the area of the rectangle at Stage 6 is $(18)(3) = \boxed{54}$ square inches.
